meanings.definition: The quality of being impressive or having a strong effect on someone.
meanings.sent1: The impressiveness of the fireworks display left the audience in awe.
meanings.sent2: Her speech was filled with impressiveness, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The impressiveness of the tiny puppy trying to act tough was quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The impressiveness of the mountain's height was like a giant looming over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The impressiveness of the magician's tricks made the audience gasp in amazement.

meanings.definition: The ability to impress or make a strong impact.
meanings.sent1: His impressiveness in the interview secured him the job.
meanings.sent2: The singer's impressiveness on stage wowed the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The impressiveness of the cat's attempt to catch a laser pointer was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The impressiveness of the athlete's speed was like lightning on the track.
meanings.sent5: The impressiveness of the painting's colors made it stand out among the rest.
